name: 黃國修
objective:
Engineering Mathematics I 
  - Ordinary Differential Equations (ODEs)

Pre-request:  Pass Calculus I & II and Well-established English Skills
schedule:
wk 1 ~ wk 4   Class Intro., Chap. 1  1st Order ODEs

wk 4 (10/3)    Exam of Chap. 1 (10%)

wk 5 ~ wk 8   Chap. 2+3  2nd & High Order Linear ODEs
 
wk 9 (11/7)     Exam of Chap. 2+3 (20%)
 
wk10~wk13    Chap. 4+5  Systems of ODEs, Series Solutions of ODEs
 
wk14 (12/12)  Exam of Chap. 4+5 (20%)

wk15~wk17     Chap. 6  Laplace Transforms

wk18 (1/9)     Final Exam (chap.1~5 15% + chap.6 20% = 35%)
materials: Text book:  Advanced Engineering Mathematics, Erwin Kreyszig, 10th ed.
